dmca.title: DMCA ISP Notification Letter-Sony DSC/Thenewconnection.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Ivonne Gomez [mailto:Ivonne@NetEnforcers.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, May 25, 2006 11:29 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: DMCA ISP Notification Letter-Sony DSC/Thenewconnection.com
Subject: DMCA ISP Notification Letter-Sony DSC/Thenewconnection.com


Phoenix Office:


Ellis & Venable


101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875


Phoenix, Arizona 85003

voice: (602) 631-9393

fax: (602) 631-9796

 

May 25, 2006

 


70051820000191589077


 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

Designated Agent

The Planet Internet Services

1333 Stemmons Pkwy Ste 110

Dallas, TX 75207



Re:      Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with
respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.  

 

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
